question: 1. Quality of imaging on an insulating sample can be enhanced by:

answers.a: Increasing the pressure of chamber (lower vacuum)
answers.b: Decreasing the pressure of chamber (higher vacuum)

question: 2. Quality of imaging on an insulating sample will deteriorate when using:

answers.a: Low accelerating voltage of electron beam
answers.b: High accelerating voltage of electron beam

question: 3. The beam damage on a polymeric sample will be high at ___________ accelerating voltage and ________ beam size.

answers.a: low accelerating voltage and smaller spot size
answers.b: low accelerating voltage and bigger spot size
answers.c: high accelerating voltage and smaller spot size
answers.d: high accelerating voltage and bigger spot size

question: 4. The following image is taken _______________ conductive coating on the polymeric sample.
